issue.title: sdformat pushes visual plugin comments inside `<sdf></sdf>` tags

content.raw:
Thanks for the context @chapulina!

I'm using the following versions:

* Gazebo: We're using Gazebo tag gazebo7_7.0.0 compiled from source from here: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/downloads/?tab=tags
* Sdformat: 4.0.0-1ubuntu2
* Ubuntu 16.04 LTS + ROS Kinetic

Here's a small example sdf:
```
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<sdf version="1.6" >
  <model name="block">
    <pose>0 0 0 0 0 0</pose>
    <link name="block_link">
      <gravity>0</gravity>
      <inertial>
        <mass>0.001</mass>
        <inertia>
          <ixx>0.001</ixx>
          <ixy>0.0</ixy>
          <ixz>0.0</ixz>
          <iyy>0.001</iyy>
          <iyz>0.0</iyz>
          <izz>0.001</izz>
        </inertia>
      </inertial>
      <visual name="visual">
        <geometry>
          <box>
            <size>1 1 1</size>
          </box>
        </geometry>
        <plugin filename="libgazebo_ros_video.so" name="gazebo_ros_video_controller">
          <width>320</width>
        </plugin>
      </visual>
    </link>
  </model>
</sdf>
```

```
roslaunch gazebo_ros empty_world.launch
rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -file example.sdf -sdf -z 1 -model test
```

The complete output from the roslaunch command:
```
... logging to /home/piyushk/.ros/log/c09649c2-a6f8-11e7-a4a6-0242ac110002/roslaunch-2bbc92b1103d-1076.log
Checking log directory for disk usage. This may take awhile.
Press Ctrl-C to interrupt
Done checking log file disk usage. Usage is <1GB.

started roslaunch server http://2bbc92b1103d:43745/

SUMMARY
========

PARAMETERS
 * /rosdistro: kinetic
 * /rosversion: 1.12.7
 * /use_sim_time: True

NODES
  /
    gazebo (gazebo_ros/gzserver)
    gazebo_gui (gazebo_ros/gzclient)

auto-starting new master
process[master]: started with pid [1087]
ROS_MASTER_URI=http://localhost:11311

setting /run_id to c09649c2-a6f8-11e7-a4a6-0242ac110002
process[rosout-1]: started with pid [1100]
started core service [/rosout]
process[gazebo-2]: started with pid [1106]
process[gazebo_gui-3]: started with pid [1129]
[ INFO] [1506897298.434298144]: Finished loading Gazebo ROS API Plugin.
[ INFO] [1506897298.435533232]: waitForService: Service [/gazebo/set_physics_properties] has not been advertised, waiting...
[ INFO] [1506897299.602410828, 0.022000000]: waitForService: Service [/gazebo/set_physics_properties] is now available.
[ INFO] [1506897299.650948904, 0.068000000]: Physics dynamic reconfigure ready.
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
[ WARN] [1506897760.900270469]: GazeboRosVideo Plugin (ns = /) missing <topicName>, defaults to "image_raw".
[ WARN] [1506897760.900332918]: GazeboRosVideo Plugin (ns = /) missing <height>, defaults to 240.
[ INFO] [1506897760.917234310]: GazeboRosVideo (gzclient, ns = /) has started
```
content.html:
Thanks for the context @chapulina!

I'm using the following versions:

  • Gazebo: We're using Gazebo tag gazebo7_7.0.0 compiled from source from here: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/downloads/?tab=tags
  • Sdformat: 4.0.0-1ubuntu2
  • Ubuntu 16.04 LTS + ROS Kinetic

Here's a small example sdf:

<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<sdf version="1.6" >
  <model name="block">
    <pose>0 0 0 0 0 0</pose>
    <link name="block_link">
      <gravity>0</gravity>
      <inertial>
        <mass>0.001</mass>
        <inertia>
          <ixx>0.001</ixx>
          <ixy>0.0</ixy>
          <ixz>0.0</ixz>
          <iyy>0.001</iyy>
          <iyz>0.0</iyz>
          <izz>0.001</izz>
        </inertia>
      </inertial>
      <visual name="visual">
        <geometry>
          <box>
            <size>1 1 1</size>
          </box>
        </geometry>
        <plugin filename="libgazebo_ros_video.so" name="gazebo_ros_video_controller">
          <width>320</width>
        </plugin>
      </visual>
    </link>
  </model>
</sdf>

roslaunch gazebo_ros empty_world.launch
rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -file example.sdf -sdf -z 1 -model test
